name: Emu Backpackers Perth
description:
VALID PASSPORT REQUIRED TO CHECK IN

Welcome to Emu Backpackers, your comfortable, social, and budget-friendly home in the heart of vibrant Northbridge. Whether you’re a solo traveler, working holidaymaker, or backpacker on an Aussie adventure, Emu Backpackers offers everything you need to relax, recharge, and connect.

*** Clean, Comfortable, and Convenient Accommodation
We offer a variety of shared dorms and private rooms, including:
  - 4 bed mixed dorms
  - Cozy private rooms for solo travelers or couples
  - All rooms include air-conditioning, Wi-Fi, and secure lockers
  - Linen, pillows, and duvets provided when you check in

*** Why Stay at Emu Backpackers Hostel?
Prime Location
  - Just minutes from Perth CBD, Elizabeth Quay, China Town, train & bus stations
  - Surrounded by cafes, bars, supermarkets, and nightlife
  - Walk to Hyde Park, Art Gallery of WA, and Northbridge nightlife

Free Perks You’ll Love
  - Free Wi-Fi throughout the hostel
  - Free luggage storage
  - Access to laundry facilities and a fully equipped shared kitchen

Relax & Socialise
  - Spacious common lounge with Netflix & games
  - Outdoor seating area for chill vibes or mingling with travelers
  - Regular social events like city walks, and themed nights, pub nights, etc..

Safe & Secure
  - CCTV in common areas
  - Friendly staff on-site ready to help
  - Lockers provided in all dorms for peace of mind

houseRules.notes:
VALID PASSPORT REQUIRED TO CHECK IN

Check-In and Check-Out Policies
⦁	Check-in: 2:00 PM
⦁	Check-out: 10:00 AM

Property and Cancellation Policies
⦁	Full Charge - Full Deposit - If cancelled within 127 days of arrival

Terms and Conditions
⦁	Non-refundable rates, after you have booked, the booking is non-refundable, even if you change your mind and need to check out early.
⦁	Require a VALID PASSPORT to check-in only, other forms of photo ID are not accepted.
⦁	The deposit of AUD $20 will be taken from the credit card provided at the time of booking, this will be reimbursed at check-out, minus any charges (e.g. lost keys, unwashed dishes, damages).
⦁	Minimum check-in age: 18 years. 
⦁	No visitors are permitted on the property at any time.
⦁	Pets are not allowed.
⦁	All special requests are subject to availability and may incur additional charges(e.g. towel rental, printing, etc).
⦁	Guests must adhere to house rules at all times.
⦁	The property reserves the right to evict guests without refund if rules are breached.
⦁	The hostel is not responsible for any loss, theft, or damage to personal belongings. Please keep your valuables secure and use the lockers provided.
